ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:58:27 [Issue ID 4000-169139] urn:comicvine:4000-169139 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 14:30:34. [Issue ID 76534]
ComicInfo.Summary: War Worlds: The Warheads destroy an alien society perpetually engaged in war for the profits. X-Force is training at their base when Shatterstar gets sucked through a dimensional wormhole. The rest of the team follows. The Warheads investigate the appearance of random wormholes and enter one of them. They appear on a planet where the male members of the team start feeling hyper violent. They also encounter X-Force and the teams battle.
ComicInfo.Title: War Worlds
